item.title: Sqlalchemy使用注意
item.description: 遇到in查询之类的批量删除或者更新，可以使用synchronize_session=False db.session.delete(synchronize_session=False) 使用find_in_set from sqlalchemy.sql.expression import func db.session.query(Post).filter(func.find_in_set('10', Post.c.tag_id)) 批量增加删除 db.session.add_all(instances) db.session.delete_all(instances) Mysql IS NULL判断 isnot() is_() Mysql 联合主键 from sqlalchemy import PrimaryKeyConstraint class Node(Model): __table_args__ = ( PrimaryKeyConstraint('pk1', 'pk2'), ) Flask_sqlalchemy支持Double精度类型字段 from sqlalchemy import Column from sqlalchemy.dialects.mysql import DOUBLE from app import db class BaseModel(Model): id = db.Column(db.Integer, primary_key=True) # Flask_sqlalchemy double_column = Column(DOUBLE, comment='双精度字段') # Sqlalchemy mysql double column subquery使用实例
